4865.「うん？ ドゥラ院長に 何か用か？\n だが 院長は……:
Hmm? You need Director Dura for something?
Sorry, but he's...

4869.「あれで ラミザ王子と同じ １６歳とは。\n まったく たいした若者だ……。:
To think he's only 16 years old, the same age
as Prince Ramiza... what a brilliant young
man...

4871.「待っておったぞ ドゥラ。\n 今にも失われそうな 太陽の石のかがやきを\n 取:
I've been waiting for you, Dura. Is it true?
Can you really restore the shine of our fading
Sun Stone?

4872.「はい ウラード国王。\n まずは こちらを ご覧ください。:
Yes, King Woolard.
Please look at this.

4873.「それは…… まさか 太陽の石か！？: No way... that's a Sun Stone?! But how?!

4875.「どうやって 太陽の石を 手に入れたのじゃ！？\n 数十年も前に 掘りつくされ\:
How did you manage to find one?! It's said to
have been all dug up and depleted decades
ago!

4877.「創った……じゃと！？\n そんなこと できるはずが……。:
You... created it?! How is that even
possible...?

4878.「では 今から 実際に\n 太陽の石を 創ってみせましょう。:
Now, I will show you how a Sun Stone is
actually created.

4880.「はい。悪しき瘴気の塊 魔瘴石でございます。\n ですが この魔法布の上に置き\:
Yes. This lump of evil miasma is a Miasmite.
However, by placing it on the Magicloth, you
won't touch it directly.

4883.「ま まさか……！\n 魔瘴石を 太陽の石に変えたというのか！？:
U-unbelievable! You're telling me that you
turned that Miasmite into a Sun Stone?!

4884.「魔瘴石と 太陽の石……。\n 陰と陽のちがいは ありますが\n どちらも 強い:
The Miasmite and Sun Stone... although their
power is opposite of one another, they are
both indeed strong.

4885.「私は 長い研究の末 たどりついたのです！\n 魔瘴石は チカラの向きを変えると:
After much research, I've come to the
conclusion that a Miasmite can become a Sun
Stone by reversing its power!!

4887.「よくやった ドゥラよ。\n そなたの情熱が ついに 実を結んだのじゃな！:
Well done, Dura. Your deep passion has finally
paid off!

4888.「おほめにあずかり 光栄でございます。\n しかし まだ 安心はできません。:
I'm honored to hear you say that. However, we
cannot rest easy just yet.

4889.「この国を支える 頭上の太陽の石が\n 太古のかがやきを 取り戻すためには\n:
We need many Miasmites to restore the Sun
Stone's glow to its former glory!

4890.「なるほど。\n では さっそく 魔瘴石を集めさせよう！:
Understood. Now, I shall have you collect more
Miasmites right away!

4891.「聞いた通りだ 皆の者！\n これより 魔瘴石を集めてきた者には\n その量に応:
You heard what he said! Those who bring lots
of Miasmites here will be rewarded most
accordingly!

4892.「魔瘴石は この国の東にある\n カルサドラ火山で 多く採れます。\n 現地にい:
The Miasmites are most abundant in the
Calsadora Volcano to the east. Please follow
the instructions of the researcher on site.

4893.「ドルワームを救うのは…… この私だ！: The one who will save Dolworm... is me!

4894.「魔瘴石ってヤツを 大量に集めてきたら\n それだけ 注目を浴びるってワケね。\:
If I collect a bunch of those Miasmites, I'll
get a bunch of attention too..
This could be good...

4895.「あら あなたは たしか……。\n あたしの元下僕の <pc>じゃないッ！？:
Hey, wait a minute... Aren't you
my former servant, <pc>?!

4896.「くくく…… いいところで 会ったわね！\n タイミングのよさに免じて\n もう:
Hehehe... what a good timing for you! You have
the honor of becoming my servant again!

4897.「あら あなた……。\n なかなか いい目をしてるじゃないッ！？\n 名前は……:
Hey, you there... You've got sharp eyes, don't
you? Your name's... <pc>. Gotcha.

4898.「ふふん 気に入ったわ！\n ちょうど 人手のほしいところだったし\n あなた:
I love it! Just when I was in need of some old
fashioned manpower... you can be a servant
for me, the amazing Lunana!

4899.「それでは さっそく 命令するわ！\n 今すぐ 東のカルサドラ火山へ行き\n 大:
And for my first order! Go to Calsadora
Volcano right now and get me tons of those
Miasmites!!

4901.「我が国では 魔瘴石を集めてきた者に\n ほうびを 与えることにした。:
In our country, we have decided to give a
reward to those who have collected the
Miasmite.

4902.「ウデに 自信があるのなら\n この国の東にある カルサドラ火山へ向かい\n 魔:
If you are confident in your skills, head to
the Calzadora volcano in the east of this
country and get the Miasmite.

4905.「ドゥラくん すごかったよねえ。\n 父上も あんなに よろこんでさ……。:
Dura was amazing, wasn't he?
Father looked so happy...

4906.「ど どうして ボクは ダメなのかな。\n ボクは 捨てられた兄弟の分まで\n:
W-why can't I be good enough...? I've been
doing my best to make up for my missing
sibling...

4908.「いやあ～ たんまり 掘ったなあ！: Wooow, we sure dug up a lot!

4909.「これだけありゃ いったい\n どれくらい ほうびが もらえるのか……。\n ダ:
I wonder how much we'll be rewarded for it...
Gahahahaha! It's making me all giddy!

4910.「あなたも 魔瘴石を\n 掘りにいらっしゃったんですか？: Are you here to dig for Miasmites too?

4911.「あら <pc>！\n ちゃんと 待ってるなんて エライじゃないの。:
Hey, <pc>! How nice of you
to wait for me.

4912.「ふ～ん…… ここね？\n 魔瘴石が採れるっていう 洞くつは。:
Hmm... so this is the place where you can dig
up Miasmites?

4913.「……は はい。\n でも ずいぶん 掘られてしまった後ですし\n かなり奥まで:
Y-yes. But many have been dug up since long
ago, so you'll have to go quite deep to find
any.

4914.「ふふん 上等よッ！\n 誰も見たことがないくらい デカイ魔瘴石を\n 掘りだし:
Heh heh, no problem! I'll dig up the biggest
Miasmite you've ever seen!

4916.「わ わかりました。それでは 皆さん\n この布を お受け取りください。:
V-very good. Now please, take this cloth with
you.

4920.「あたしたちが 来る前に\n 掃除しておくなんて 下僕のカガミ……\n まさに:
Only an elite servant could clean up this mess
before we arrived...

4921.「ふっふっふ……。\n この辺りは まだ誰も 掘ってないみたいだし\n デカイ魔:
Hehehe... I'm sure we can find a gigantic
Miasmite here. It doesn't look like anyone has
dug around here yet.

4923.「くくく…… 感じるわ。\n 魔瘴石の気配を ヒシヒシとねッ！:
Heh heh... I can feel it. We're getting closer
to the Miasmite!

4924.「出るわ！ デカイ魔瘴石が 出るわよッ！！:
That's right! The biggest Miasmite is gonna
pop out!

4927.「何よ これ？ おふだ？\n ずいぶん 古くさい封印ね……。\n しかも 解けか:
What is this thing, a talisman? The seal looks
really old... and it's almost worn off.

4929.「見て！ 巨大な魔瘴石よッ！\n 私の思った通り このおふだで\n こいつを封じ:
Look! A huge Miasmite! Just as I thought, the
seal was covering it!!

4930.「ふ 封印を 解いちまったりして\n いいんですかい ルナナさま！？:
M-miss Lunana, is it really okay to just break
the seal like that...?!

4931.「ふんッ 何を 怖じ気づいてるのよ！\n そのために 魔法布が あるんでしょッ！:
What, are you scared or something?! That's
what the Magicloth is for! Now hurry up and
dig this thing out!!

4933.「バカの相手は 疲れるわ……。\n 採掘のウデ前が なかったら\n とっくに ク:
I'm so tired of dealing with morons... if it
weren't for your mining skills, I would've
fired you a long time ago.

4936.「いや～ん！\n やればできるじゃないの あなたたち～！: Woooo-w! You guys really did it!

4937.「さあ それを持って\n ドルワームに戻るわよッ！: Come on, let's take it back to Dolworm!

4938.「ああ…… <cs_pchero>にも\n 魔物を掃除してくれた ごほうびを\n:
Oh, right... <cs_pchero> needs a
reward too for wiping out those monsters.

4939.<cs_pchero>は ルナナから\n小さな魔瘴石のかけらを 受け取った！:
<cs_pchero> received a tiny shard of
the Miasmite from Lunana!

4941.どこからか もの悲しい音楽が\n聞こえてくる……。:
A melancholic melody could be heard coming
from somewhere...

4942.「ラララ 遠い昔の物語～♪\n 王家に生まれた 双子の子～。\n 王位を争い 国:
A tale from long, long ago...
Royal twins, fight for the throne...
The country's fate is but unknown...

4943.「時は流れて 歴史はめぐり～♪\n またも 生まれた 災いの双子～。\n ３つの:
Time flies, and history repeats...
The cursed twins, born in this land...
Destined three stars upon their hand...

4944.「そうはいえども かわいい 我が子～♪\n 誰が この子を手放せようか～。\n:
Even so, sweet, sweet child...
Who on earth could let you go?
And blame you too, to go so low?

4945.「国を選ぶか 我が子を選ぶか～♪\n ふたつにひとつ ふたつにひとつ～。\n 星:
To choose your country, or your child...
One or the other, just one choice...
On this starry night, may we rejoice...

4946.「むむむっ！ あなた 魔瘴石をお持ちですねっ？\n 魔法布と一緒に 回収させてい:
Oh!!! You have a Miasmite, don't you? I will
take that along with the Magicloth!

4948.「おおっと これはっ！！\n なんと まれに見る ささやかさっ……。: Oh, wow! How rare and modest this is...

4949.「すみません。\n そういうことなので お礼も ささやかでっ。:
Sorry. I suppose you're owed a modest reward
for this, then.

4951.「さっきまでは すごーい行列だったんですが\n さすがに そろそろ 終わりかなっ:
There was a huge line of people waiting to get
inside, but it seems it's died down.

4954.「あら <pc> ずいぶん早い到着ね！\n うふふ…… 荷物が増えないように\n:
Oh, <pc>, you got here so fast!
Hehe... you should be thanking me for carrying
this heavy thing for you!

4956.「ねえ あなた！\n 王立研究院の人でしょッ！？\n さっさと 魔瘴石を 引き取:
Hey, you! You're from the Royal Research
Institute, aren't you?! Hurry up and take
this thing inside!

4959.「こっちは この魔瘴石のせいで\n ノロノロとしか歩けなくて 疲れてるのにッ！！:
I'm tired of walking at a snail's pace all
because of this annoying thing!

4960.「なんて 見事な魔瘴石だ……！: What a stunning Miasmite this is...!

4961.「すばらしい！！\n これだけの魔瘴石が あれば\n ドルワームは 永遠に安泰だ:
Brilliant! With this Miasmite alone, Dolworm
will be safe forever!

4962.「さあ この魔瘴石を 玉座の間へ！\n さっそく 太陽の石に 変えるとしよう。:
Okay, take this to the throne room! I'll
quickly change it into a Sun Stone.

4963.「本当に ありがとう。\n あなた方のおかげで 私の夢が かなう。:
I really can't thank you enough. Because of
you, my dreams have come true.

4964.「さあ 私と 一緒に来てください！\n 皆さんに キーエンブレムが贈られるよう\:
Please come with me! I'll advise the King to
present you all with Key Emblems for your
efforts!

4966.「ふふふ…… 当然よねッ！\n あたしは この国の英雄なんだから<heart>:
Hm hm hm... of course! I AM a hero of this
country, after all! <heart>

4969.「この巨大な魔瘴石は こちらにいらっしゃる\n ルナナさんと その仲間たちによっ:
This gigantic Miasmite was dug out by Lunana
and her companions here.

4970.「これを 太陽の石に変えて 補充すれば\n ドルワームの太陽は 永遠に\n かが:
If it's converted and purified into a Sun
Stone, the sun of Dolworm will never lose its
glow ever again.

4971.「そう！ 私の研究の成果で\n ドルワームは 救われるのです！！:
Finally! The results of my research shall save
Dolworm!

4975.「ドゥラよ 礼を言おウ。\n 今 ふたタビ 地上に出ることができたノハ\n すべ:
I MUST THANK YOU, DURA.
I CAN ONCE AGAIN ROAM THIS LAND...

4978.「思いダセ……。\n 太陽の石ヲ作るために 魔瘴石ノ利用を\n 思いつイタ アノ:
THINK... THAT DAY YOU THOUGHT TO USE MIASMITE
TO TURN INTO SUN STONES...

4979.「ククク……。\n お前に 魔瘴石を使うよう助言したのハ\n 神の声などでは ナ:
HA HA... IT WAS NOT THE VOICE OF GOD THAT
ADVISED YOU.

4980.「ま まさか あれは……\n あのときの声は…… お前が！？: N-no way.... then that voice... it was you?!

4981.「……さよウ。\n 魔瘴石ヲ集めさせルタメ 我ハ\n お前ヲ 利用させてモらった:
...CORRECT. I USED YOU FOR THE SOLE PURPOSE
OF SEARCHING FOR MIASMITE.

4982.「魔瘴石と成りはテタ 我ノ魂ヲ\n 封印から 解きはなってもらうためにナ！！:
MY SOUL LIE TRAPPED INSIDE THAT STONE...
I PATIENTLY AWAITED FOR ITS SEAL TO BE
BROKEN!!

4983.「ふ 封印って まさか……\n あのとき ルナナさまが解いちゃった……？:
D-did he say seal...?
Didn't Lunana break a seal back in the
volcano...?

4984.「うるさいッ！ この アブラねんどッ！！: You moron! Keep your voice down!!

4985.「魂ガ よみがえった 今\n あとハ 肉体ヲ取り戻セバ 我ハ自由ダ！！:
MY SOUL HAS BEEN RESTORED, AND ALL THAT
REMAINS IS MY BODY. THEN I WILL BE FREE!

4987.「あんなヤツが 埋まってるなんて\n 聞いてないもの！\n あたしが 悪いんじゃ:
I had no idea that thing was buried there!
It's not my fault!!

4989.「なんということじゃ……。\n かつて この国を滅ぼそうとした 伝説の魔物\n:
My goodness... that monster of legend
Kukulkannibal once tried to destroy this
country, and now has returned...

4991.「お前ほどの者が 功をあせり\n 魔物に つけこまれるとは……。:
That a man of your caliber could be taken
advantage of by a monster...

4992.「富 名声 知識……。\n それらを求めすぎた ドワーフたちの末路を\n 知らぬ:
Wealth, fame, knowledge... You have no doubt
seen what happens to Dwarves who seek too much
of these things.

4993.「私は…… どうしても この国を救いたかった！\n 救わなくては ならなかったん:
I... I had to save this country! No matter
what it took!

4994.「ウラード国王っ！\n あなたは この３つのホクロに\n 見覚えがあるはずだ！:
King Woolard! You recognize these three dots
on my hand, don't you?

4995.「私は 国のために あなたに捨てられた\n ３つの星をつかむ子です！:
I am the child of three stars, the one you
abandoned for the sake of your country!

4996.「無能な兄 ラミザに代わって ドルワームを救い\n 私を捨てたのは まちがいだっ:
I wanted to make you apologize for your
mistake in abandoning me, and save Dolworm in
place of my useless brother, Ramiza!

4999.「その話は あとだ。\n 今は あの魔物……天魔クァバルナを\n なんとかせねば:
Now is not the time to discuss this.
For now, we must deal with that monster
Kukulkannibal!

5000.「ヤツが 向かった先に\n 心当たりのある者は いるか！？:
Do any of you have any idea where that thing
might be headed?!

5001.「……おそらく この大陸の西の果て\n ボロヌスの穴かと。:
...perhaps the Boronus Hole at the western end
of the continent.

5002.「古文書によると 天魔クァバルナは\n 肉体と魂に分けられ ボロヌスの穴の泉に\:
According to ancient texts, Kukulkannibal's
body and soul were split apart; its body
sealed in the fountain inside of the hole.

5003.「よし！ ラミザよ。\n 騎士団を率いて ボロヌスの穴へ向かうのじゃ！\n ドゥ:
Very well! Ramiza! Lead the chivalry to the
Boronus Hole! And Dura, you go with them!

5006.「まさか クァバルナの魂が\n カルサドラ火山に 封じられていたとは……。\n:
I had no idea that Kukulkannibal's soul was
sealed inside the Calsadora Volcano... why
didn't I realize it sooner?!

5007.「私の責任だ……。\n この命に代えても クァバルナを討つ！:
This is my responsibility... I will defeat
that monster, even if it costs me my life!

5008.「ドゥラめ……。なんという\n おろかなことをしてくれたのじゃ。\n よりにもよ:
That Dura... what a foolish thing he's done.
Him of all people, bringing that horrible
Kukulkannibal here...

5009.「しかし それもすべて\n 愛しい我が子を 捨ててしまった\n わしの過ちが 原:
However... this is all because of my mistake
in abandoning my beloved child...

5014.「よくモ…… よくも このような……！！: HOW DARE... YOU... HOW DARE YOU...!!

5016.「長かっタ……。\n 我ノ…… 我の いとしイ身体……。: IT'S BEEN SO LONG... MY BELOVED BODY...

5017.「もう二度ト 封印などされるモノカ！！: I WILL NOT BE SEALED AGAIN!!

5018.「生きとし生ける者ハ すべて 我が糧……！\n まずは お前から 喰らってやロウ:
I WILL FEAST UPON ALL LIVING THINGS...
...AND I WILL DEVOUR YOU FIRST!!

5019.「まだ 我ニ 挑もうとするカ？\n はかなく 弱き者よ。:
STILL YOU SEEK TO CHALLENGE ME, WEAK AND
FEEBLE ONE?

5020.「おもしろイ……。\n 次は 魂まで 喰らってやロウ！！:
HOW INTERESTING...
THIS TIME, IT'LL BE YOUR SOUL I DEVOUR!

5022.「我ハ かつて 世界最強ト 謳われた……\n そノ誇りに…… かけテ……:
I WAS ONCE KNOWN AS THE STRONGEST BEING IN
THE WORLD... I WAS SO PROUD...

5023.「このまマ 倒れるわけニハ ゆかぬうぅぅ！！: I WILL NOT BE DEFEATED LIKE THIIIISSSS!!!

5025.「クククク……！\n ドゥラ……。まだ 絶望は…終わらヌ……。\n 我が呪イ 絶:
KEH HEH HEH... DURA... DESPAIR IS STILL YET
TO COME... MY CURSE SHALL EVER ENDURE...

5026.「……あなたが クァバルナを？: ...you're the one who took care of it?

5027.「ありがとうございました。\n 私たちが 遅れてしまったせいで\n 危険な目に:
Thank you so much. My apologies that we were
late, we put you in even more danger...

5028.「ぜい ぜい…… ドゥラくん 速いよ。\n ク クァバルナは どこ？:
Huff, puff... you're fast, Dura.
W... Where is Kukulkannibal?

5029.「お前のようなヤツが\n 私の兄だなんて うんざりだ！:
I'm so sick and tired of someone like you
being my brother!

5030.「討伐のための騎士を選ぶのに 時間をかけて。\n そのために なんの関係もない旅:
You took too much time finding knights to come
along. This traveler ended up fighting him
instead, and it wasn't even their problem!

5031.「ご ごめん。\n あやまるから 怒らないで。\n ボクは 兄弟仲良くしたいんだ:
S-sorry... Please don't be angry at me. I'm
really trying to be a good brother!

5032.「そ それに 戦う人は ちゃんと選ばないと。\n ケガしたら悲しむ家族が みんな:
I have to choose the right people for the job.
If you got hurt, you'd make your family
worry.

5033.「やはり お前のような甘いヤツに\n ドルワームを まかせるわけにはいかない！:
As expected. Dolworm shouldn't be ruled by a
big softie like you!

5034.「よくぞ帰った ラミザ ドゥラ！\n 見事 クァバルナを倒してきたのだな？:
Welcome back, Ramiza and Dura! I assume you
had no trouble defeating Kukulkannibal?

5036.「天魔クァバルナを倒したのは あの者です。\n 私たちが 到着したときには\n:
This traveler is responsible for his defeat.
When we got there, the battle was already
over.

5038.「クァバルナを倒したという旅人よ。\n こちらへ 参られよ。:
Traveler who claims to have defeated
Kukulkannibal. Please come here.

5040.「……そうか <pc>というのか。\n <pc>よ。我が家臣の不始末で\n そな:
<pc>... I see...
I apologize for the trouble I caused you with
mismanagement of my vassals.

5041.「そなたのはたらきと 勇気をたたえ……:
In recognition of your hard work and brave
deeds...

5042.「た 太陽の石がっ！！\n いったい 何が起こったのじゃ！？: What's happening to the Sun Stone?!

5044.「恐れながら 国王様。\n 一部 太陽の石になりきれなかった魔瘴石があり\n そ:
With all due respect, your Majesty, but there
are some Miasmites that failed to become Sun
Stones. That must be the problem.

5046.「この暴走を 止めるのです。\n 太陽の石のチカラを 制御できるのは\n ドルワ:
You must stop the stone. Only those of
Dolworm's royal blood can control the Sun
Stone's power!

5047.「私が 止めてみせましょう！\n それが 私が この国の王子であるという\n 何:
I shall stop it! That way, I can prove that I
am the true prince of this country!

5048.「ムダじゃ！ お前は 王家の者ではない！: Don't bother! You are not of royalty!

5049.「なぜ 認めないっ！？: Why can't you just admit it?!

5050.「国のために 子を捨てたのでしょう！？\n 正しいことをしたと思っているのなら\:
You abandoned your own child for your country!
If you really think you did the right thing,
you deserve to be recognized for it!!

5051.「だが 子を捨てた罪は 決して消えない！\n 私の恨みも 消えることはない……！:
But the sin of abandoning your child will
never go away! Neither will my resentment for
you!!

5052.「見ろっ！！\n 私が 捨てられた王子だ！！！: Don't you see?! I am the abandoned prince!!!!

5053.「止まれ！ 太陽の石よ！！\n 暴走をやめろ！！！: Stop, Sun Stone! Stop this rampage!!

5058.「国王様っ！ チカラをお貸しください！\n 早く 太陽の石を抑えないと\n お城:
Your Majesty, I need your help! If we don't do
something about the Sun Stone now,
the whole castle is history!!

5060.「止まらぬぞ……！\n わしのチカラだけでは 足りぬのか！？:
It's not stopping...
Is my power not enough...?!

5064.「ううっ。ドゥラくん かわいそう……。\n ここまで 一生懸命……\n がんばっ:
*sob* Poor Dura... He's worked so hard...
...to get this far... *sob*

5065.「ボクより…… 王子らしいのに……\n 王子じゃないなんて………。:
He's more of a prince... than I'll ever be...
...and he's not even a prince...

5066.「王子 お願いです！\n チカラを貸してください！: Please! Please lend him your strength!

5071.「お願いします ラミザ王子！\n あなたのチカラが 必要なんです！！: Please, Ramiza! We really need your help!!

5072.「どうしよう これでも治まらないなんて。\n このままじゃ 城ごと 私たちは……:
Nothing's working... what should we do...?
If this keeps up, we'll all be...

5077.「チリ…… と言ったか。\n わしに 顔を見せておくれ。: Chiri, was it? Let me see your face.

5078.「そうか…… お前だったのか。: I see... it really is you.

5079.「すまなかった……。\n あのとき わしは お前を手放す以外に\n 国を守る方法:
I'm so sorry... at the time, I believed that
the only way to protect this country was
to let you go.

5080.「だが 結果的に 多くの者をキズつけ\n この国に 新たな悲劇を生んでしまった。:
But... as a result, many people were hurt and
a new tragedy befell our country... I had
made the wrong choice.

5081.「チリよ。この王宮で 一緒に暮らさぬか？\n 亡き王妃も お前を手放したことを\:
Chiri, will you come and live with us here in
the palace? Your late mother had been so
upset about giving you away as well.

5084.「ですが…… 王宮の生活は\n きっと 私には あいません。:
However... I can say for certain that a life
inside this palace is not for me.

5085.「私の父は ガタラに住む 養父だけ。\n 変わり者だけど 愛情込めて育ててくれま:
My father is the person who adopted and raised
me. He is a strange man, but he did raise me.
I want to live freely, the same way he does.

5087.「ウラード国王 暴言の数々を お許しください。\n 私は もう二度と ドルワーム:
King Woolard, I apologize for my outbursts.
I will never again step foot on Dolworm soil.

5088.「待ってください ドゥラ院長！\n 院長の代わりになるような研究者は\n どこに:
Wait, Dura! There is not a single researcher
here who could replace you as Director.

5089.「院長なら クァバルナの入れ知恵なんてなくても\n いつか 太陽の石を 創りだせ:
You could've created the Sun Stone someday
without Kukulkannibal's intervention!
I truly believe that!

5092.「ドゥラよ。そなたには これからも\n 王立研究院の長であることを 命ずる。\n:
Dura. You shall remain as head of the Royal
Research Institute. I ask that you continue
to lend me your strength for Dolworm's sake.

5094.「そして もちろん 忘れてはならぬ。\n 見事 天魔クァバルナを葬ってくれた\n:
And of course, we mustn't forget!
<pc>, the hero of Dolworm, who
valiantly buried that monster Kukulkannibal!

5095.「そなたには ほうびとして\n 金のキーエンブレムを与えよう！:
As your reward, I shall give you the Gold Key
Emblem!

5096.<pc>は\n金のキーエンブレム（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<me 72>:
<pc> received
the Gold Key Emblem (Key Item)!<me 72>

5097.「また 今後は 水晶宮の中にある\n ドルワーム鉄道駅の利用を 許可しよう。\n:
Also, you will now be able to use the Dolworm
station inside of the palace. I hope it will
be of use to you on your travels!

5098.「そなたたちの未来に 明るい太陽の光が\n 降りそそがんことを！:
May the light of the sun shine brightly on
your future!

5099.「ああ。私の研究成果を見てもらい\n ウラード国王にも 早く\n 安心していただ:
Yes. I want King Woolard to see the results
of my research, so I can put his mind at ease.

5102.「それは 王立研究院で開発された 魔法布です。\n 魔瘴石に 直接 触れるのは危:
It's a magical cloth designed by the Royal
Research Institute. It's dangerous to touch
Miasmites directly, so please use the cloth.

5103.「ふふん。さあ 奥へ行くわよ <pc>！\n このルナナさまの 神がかった運のよ:
Hmph. Come on, <pc>. Let's go
deeper! I'll show you just how lucky I can be!

5106.「国王様……。\n その件は 国を想うため 仕方のなかったこと。\n どうか ご:
Your Majesty...
What happened was for the sake of this
country. Please don't blame yourself.

5108.「そなたは たしか 王立研究院の者だったな。\n 名は チリと申したか。:
You are from the Royal Research Institute,
aren't you? Chiri, was it...?

28441.「それに ラミザ王子が きっと\n 天魔クァバルナを 討ってくださると\n 私は:
And I am sure that Prince Ramiza will defeat
Kukulkannibal.

28442.「……礼を言わねばな。そなたの申す通りじゃ。\n 今は ラミザを信じ 待つことに:
I must thank you. You are right. For now, I
will trust Ramiza and wait.

28444.「そなたは 旅の者か。\n こんなときに ドルワームを訪れるとは\n ついておら:
A traveler? I hate to say it, but you've come
to this kingdom at quite a bad time.

28445.「……ほう。なかなか ウデの立ちそうな旅人だ。\n どうじゃ？ そなたさえよけれ:
Hmm...they do seem to be quite skilled...
How about it? Will you aid in the defeat of
the Kukulkannibal?

28446.「ラミザを 信頼していないわけではないが\n ひとりでも 味方が増えたほうが\n:
It's not that I don't trust Ramiza, I do...
But I'm sure he'd feel more confident in
himself with another companion by his side.

28447.「天魔クァバルナは この大陸の西の果て\n ボロヌスの穴に 向かったそうじゃ。\:
I heard that demon has made its way towards
the Boronus Hole to the far west. Don't worry,
you will be rewarded for your efforts!

28448.「ドゥラよ クァバルナの言ったことは 本当か？\n あろうことか ヤツの知恵を借:
Is what Kukulkannibal said true, Dura? You
heeded his wisdom to create the Sun Stone?

28449.「さあ ムチェ ブチャ！\n あなたたちの出番よ。\n さっさと 掘ってちょうだ:
Okay, Mutch and Butch! Make it snappy.
Get digging already!!

28451.<cs_pchero>は 小さな魔瘴石のかけらを\n持っていた魔法布で 包んだ。:
<cs_pchero> wrapped the small shard
of the Miasmite in the Magicloth.

28452.「アグラニでは 散々な目にあったけど\n このドルワームで活躍をして 今度こそ\:
Agrani didn't go all that well, so...
If I do a good job here, word of my success
will spread all over!

28453.「私の夢は 世界一の名声を 手に入れること！\n このドルワームで 活躍をして\:
My dream is to be famous all around the world!
If I do a good job here, word of my success
will spread all over!

28454.「命令に背いたら 痛い目を見るからね。\n 頼んだわよ <pc>！:
If you disobey, you'll regret it!
Don't disappoint me, <pc>!

32286.「ドルワームに 平和を もたらしてくれた\n すべての者たちに 感謝する。:
Thank you to all those who have brought peace
to Dolworm.
